elements.description:
### Usage

  <px-simple-win-loss-chart chart-data="[1,-2,3]"></px-simple-win-loss-chart>

### Styling
The following custom properties are available for styling:

Custom property | Description
:----------------|:-------------
`--px-win-loss-border-color` | Border color for the chart
`--px-win-loss-background-color` | Background color for the chart
`--px-win-loss-positive-fill-color` | Fill color for positive bars
`--px-win-loss-negative-fill-color` | Fill color for negative bars

properties.name: _defaultWidth
properties.description: Sets the default width of the component in pixels.

properties.name: _defaultHeight
properties.description: Sets the default height of the component in pixels.

properties.name: _minimumWidth
properties.description: Sets the minimum width of the component in pixels.

properties.name: _minimumHeight
properties.description: Sets the minimum height of the component in pixels.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Width of the chart. Numeric or "auto".

properties.name: height
properties.description: Height of the chart. Numeric or "auto".

properties.name: chartData
properties.description: This attribute defines the series data to be charted. It needs to be passed in as an array.

methods.name: attached
methods.description:
Polymer fires this event automatically, we use it to define
this.svg and initiate the component

methods.name: _drawChart
methods.description: Removes previous chart, draws new chart. Debounced.

methods.name: _removeChart
methods.description: Removes previous chart contents. Debounced.

methods.name: _removeChartDebounced
methods.description:
Resizes the SVG element and clears any internal
contents. This is necessary between redrawing the chart.
Depends on this.svg being a D3 selection of the chart's SVG element.

methods.name: _addStyleScope
methods.description:
Adds the style-scope class of the component to all SVG
child nodes. This is necessary because Polymer, while applying the class
to child HTML elements, does not apply the class to child SVG elements

methods.name: _addStyleScopeToElement
methods.description:
Pass in a d3 selection and this function will ensure that
Polymer style-scope is applied.

methods.name: _clearSVG
methods.description:
Selects the SVG of the chart, shrinks it to 1px by 1px and
empties it of child elements. This is necessary to do before drawing or
redrawing the chart.

methods.name: _getSeriesTotal
methods.description: Returns the sum of the values of a series.

methods.name: _getLongestSeries
methods.description: Returns the longest series based on the array of series passed.

methods.name: _calculateTextSize
methods.description:
Method returns the size of an SVG text element and
its position relative to the viewport.

The essential DOM function is getBoundingClientRect():
https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Element/getBoundingClientRect

Returns a rect object with the following properties:

   height - float - Height of the rectangle box (This is identical to bottom minus top). Read only.
   width - float - Width of the rectangle box (This is identical to right minus left). Read only.
   top - float - Y-coordinate, relative to the viewport origin, of the top of the rectangle box. Read only.
   left - float - X-coordinate, relative to the viewport origin, of the left of the rectangle box. Read only.
   bottom - float - Y-coordinate, relative to the viewport origin, of the bottom of the rectangle box. Read only.
   right - float - X-coordinate, relative to the viewport origin, of the right of the rectangle box. Read only.

methods.name: _calculateTextHeight
methods.description: Returns height of SVG text element.

methods.name: _calculateTextWidth
methods.description: Returns width of SVG text element.

methods.name: _reconcileValue
methods.description:
Reconcile the incoming value on an element's attribute
This is necessary because some values may come in as one type but
need to be interpreted as another type.

methods.name: _ensureMinimum
methods.description: Ensures that a Number is equal to or greater than a min.

methods.name: _reconcileWidth
methods.description: Reconciles the value assigned to width.

methods.name: _reconcileHeight
methods.description: Reconciles the value assigned to height.

methods.name: _reconcileDimensionValue
methods.description: Reconciles the value assigned to height or width.

methods.name: _getAutoValue
methods.description:
Returns the 'automatic' value for height or width based on
parent node dimensions.

methods.name: _getElementPadding
methods.description: Returns the padding of an element's computed style.

methods.name: _setDimensions
methods.description:
Sets the dimensions of the component's `this.widthValue`
and `this.heightValue`.

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: Width of the chart. Numeric or "auto".

attributes.name: height
attributes.description: Height of the chart. Numeric or "auto".

attributes.name: chart-data
attributes.description: This attribute defines the series data to be charted. It needs to be passed in as an array.
